name: I entered the dungeon for loot, but there are skeletons everywhere!
name_original: I entered the dungeon for loot, but there are skeletons everywhere!
description:
「I entered the dungeon for loot, but there are skeletons everywhere!」

An infinite-runner game with dungeon theme.

Developed for Mini Jam 45: Dungeons.

Programmer & Game Designer: Alper Şekerci

Sprite Artist: Saro Hibardiyan

Background Music: joshuaempyre
